meanings.definition: A wild South American mammal similar to a llama.
meanings.sent1: The guanaco grazed peacefully in the grassy meadow.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of guanacos roaming freely in the Andes mountains.
meanings.sent3: The guanaco decided to try stand-up comedy, but the audience was all llamas!
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as untamed as a guanaco running across the open plains.
meanings.sent5: The children were mesmerized by the graceful movements of the guanaco.

meanings.sent1: She admired the softness of the guanaco fur scarf.
meanings.sent2: The luxurious coat was made from the finest guanaco fur.
meanings.sent3: The guanaco fur coat kept her warm even in the coldest winter days.
meanings.sent4: His words were as comforting as wrapping oneself in guanaco fur.
meanings.sent5: The touch of guanaco fur against her skin was pure bliss.
